A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie Is visually stunning  and has many great parts. It's a good stand alone film but an awful Movie in the Star Wars Universe! It gives the middle finger to everything that happens between episodes 1-7. It also completely dishonors Luke Skywalker. Don't get me wrong this is not a bad made movie. If u like the play book thrown out u will like it. If u like staying true to the past you will not like it. This movie also hates on men and has many political statements in it that I don't feel belong in Star Wars but that's me. (Eat the bird Chue). Many Seens that were funny had a pulitical tone to them. If this movie stayed true to the bast on people behavior it would of been a 10/10.
